DOC.brief_summary: A study to assess the safety and effectiveness of tacrolimus cream in the treatment of psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Safety and Effectiveness of Tacrolimus Cream in the Treatment of Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of plaque psoriasis Skin disorder other than plaque psoriasis in the areas to be treated. Disease on only elbows, knees, and scalp
